name: Hoverkitty In The Hoververse Chapter Two
name_original: Hoverkitty In The Hoververse Chapter Two
description:
Hoverkitty is back, and she needs help. Help Hoverkitty as she goes on a epic adventure, where the choices she makes lead her on a journey that could save, or destroy, the Hoververse.

Play as Hoverkitty and collect treats, escape traps, gather a special weapon, and defeat enemies. Use your keyboard or your controller to solve the mysteries that await in this perilous land, full of surprises and illusion. In a completely 3D world that ranges from open world to sidescroller, you are sure to have a captivating time rollicking around this charmingly whimsical game.

You will face old enemies and new villains will be as you play with Hoverkitty's friend, Aive. Can you help them escape the clutches of the perilous nemesis and bring peace back to the Hoververse?
